main.observer

Class XMLManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.observer.XMLManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClubObserver

    public class XMLManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClubObserver
    The XML Manager reads, writes and changes elements of a XML file. The XML file stores all information about club members.
    Author:
    Stefan Eike (s.eike85@gmail.com)
